long_description: When traveling by train or plane, secure your luggage with this sturdy steel web of protection. Flexible, high-tensile, slash-proof, stainless-steel wire hugs your bag, eliminating access to pockets and strapped-on items. Use while traveling in areas known for pilfering, or when left unattended in hostels, trains or baggage check. Fits over wheeled luggage yet still allows access to the handle and freedom of movement in the wheels. Equips wheeled luggage and duffel bags from 32 to 36 in. long (maximum bag size: 36 x 16 x 14 in.; approximate volume: 6,000 - 8,500 cu. in.). Folds up and stuffs into a compact, 7 x 4 x 2.5 in. nylon carrying pouch for easy packing. Brass padlock and polycarbonate locking system with adjustable draw wire secures pack to fixed objects to deter theft. Please note: Lock is not Travel Sentry(TM) approved; locks that are approved allow airport screeners access without damaging the lock.
short_description: When traveling by train or plane, secure your luggage with this sturdy steel web of protection.
